text: Maya Gallery is helmed by husband and wife duo,Jeffrey Wandly and Masturah Sha'ari. They are also practicing artists and have an active exhibition schedule at their gallery. Currently on show is the 62nd exhibition of the APAD artists, which they have taken part too. It lasts till 3 August, do check out the wide range of artworks from emerging to esteemed artists spanning diverse media. They are down to earth and approachable and have artworks that can suit every budget. Certainly worth a trip down Genting Lane!
Interesting art pieces from local artists, friendly owners too!
Art gallery that promotes art in Singapore.
